long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple chrome extension changes your New Tab page into a fully customisable, user-created dashboard. It allows to add shapes, texts, clocks, bookmarks and so much more!

This allows the New Tab page to have a distinct and simple look and feel, while also remaining useful.
